auto_assignment.confirm_details: This action will create {count} new assignment(s).
auto_assignment.description: The automatic assignment algorithm intelligently distributes volunteers to time slots while respecting their preferences, availability, and your organizational constraints.
auto_assignment.hours_per_day_help: Sets the minimum and maximum number of hours per day
auto_assignment.hours_per_volunteer_help: Sets the minimum and maximum number of hours per volunteer
auto_assignment.keep_existing_help: Only adds new assignments without removing existing ones
auto_assignment.max_overtime_help_detailed: Number of overtime hours allowed beyond the set limit
auto_assignment.prioritize_experience_help: Favors experienced volunteers for critical time slots
auto_assignment.respect_availability_help: Never assigns a volunteer to a slot where they're not available
auto_assignment.respect_team_preferences_help: Only assigns volunteers to teams they selected in their preferences
auto_assignment.respect_time_preferences_help: Only assigns volunteers to time slots matching their time preferences
auto_assignment.title: Automatic Assignment
